process.command: sensat character(3), typeid varchar(16), subtype character(1), filecat character(1), dataunit varchar(32), L1type varchar(4), collection varchar(2), tier varchar(2), scenenameform varchar(255), basenameform varchar(255), scenecompstr varchar(255), basecompstr varchar(255), archive varchar(16), PRIMARY KEY (typeid,subtype)

sensat character(3) NOT NULL, typeid varchar(16) NOT NULL, compid varchar(128), subtype character(1) NOT NULL, filecat character(1), band varchar(32) NOT NULL, prefix varchar(32) NOT NULL, suffix varchar(32) NOT NULL, pattern varchar(128) NOT NULL, hdfgrid varchar(32), celltype varchar(8), fileext varchar(8), folder varchar(32) NOT NULL, required character(1), PRIMARY KEY (typeid,subtype,band)
